content: @Grahame Grieve , can you confirm what the CORs settings are for your FHIR server? I tried pointing one of our tools (https://clyde.lantanagroup.com) to your FHIR server, and the browser seemed to block requests to your FHIR server. Guessing because of CORs...
shouldn't, but I'll investigate when I get a chance. AFAIK CORS is all enabled
but you probably used HTTPS - that means you have to OAuth on my server. That's a todo
